meta.title: Javier | Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Javier, Front-end Manager & UI Developer specialized in building accessible, scalable, and high-performance web applications.
meta.keywords: Front-end, Web Development, UI/UX, React, Next.js, StencilJS, Design Systems

hero.description: Passionate about building clean, fast, and usable interfaces. I love combining design and code to create web experiences that stand out.

experiences.title: Front-end Manager | UI/UX Solutions Expert
description: I lead a team of frontend developers in the creation and integration of modern, responsive, and accessible web interfaces, ensuring high standards of quality and usability.

Design and development of scalable UI solutions using technologies such as HTML5, JavaScript, TypeScript, SASS, and modern frameworks like Angular and StencilJS, with special focus on modularity and component reuse.
Implementation of Web Components with StencilJS, efficiently integrated into multiplatform applications.
Close coordination with UX/UI teams and stakeholders, using tools like Figma and Adobe XD, to transform prototypes into intuitive and consistent digital experiences.
Promotion and implementation of agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban), focusing on continuous delivery, process improvement, and cross-team collaboration.
Active participation in strategic product planning, task prioritization, and key technical decision-making oriented towards scalability and efficiency.
Constant focus on improving the end-user experience, applying accessibility principles, user-centered design, and usability testing.

experiences.title: Front-end & Back-end Developer
description: Web layout and integration. HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS3, SASS.
Development of mobile Apps for Android and iOS.
Development and maintenance of dynamic applications in JSP (Java), ensuring smooth integration with backend services.
Management and optimization of relational databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, OracleSQL, SQLite), ensuring performance and security in data handling.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Front-end Manager specialized in UI/UX with over 5 years of experience in web development, component system design, and technical leadership. Since 2023 I lead the frontend team at ATM Grupo Maggioli, where I direct the creation and evolution of IRIS, a corporate Design System based on Web Components with StencilJS that unifies the company's visual identity after the merger of three companies.
about.p2: IRIS is built on a monorepo managed with Lerna, published on NPM as an internal library, and offers a complete catalog of components, from fundamental pieces (buttons, icons, alerts) to complex interface solutions like dashboards, dynamic forms, or translation managers. Its architecture focuses on scalability, accessibility, performance, and modularity, becoming the transversal standard for new products.
about.p3: Additionally, I provide strategic support to other projects as a Scrum Master, promoting best practices in CI/CD, automation, Jira management, and agile methodologies, oriented towards continuous delivery and workflow improvement between teams.
about.p4: Previous full-stack development experience with Angular, JavaScript/TypeScript, SASS, Java/JSP, and SQL, allowing me to have a complete vision of the product cycle and communicate effectively with multidisciplinary profiles.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.p1: Throughout my experience, I have worked with various technologies, applying them in personal and professional projects. Some of them are:

items.title: IRIS
items.description: IRIS Web Components is a modern architecture based on a monorepo managed with Lerna, centralizing all visual components of the IRIS ecosystem into independent, reusable, and scalable packages, developed with Stencil.

items.title: Mobile Apps
items.description: Solutions for file management, payments, and cloud inquiries.

items.title: Electronic Headquarters
items.description: Citizen platform to consult file status, pay fees and taxes (Virtual Tax Office), manage Municipal Register tasks, Contractor Profile tracking, automatic registrations, etc.

items.title: Integral Tax Management
items.description: Cloud software platform for tax management, voluntary and executive collection, inspection, and fines.

items.title: Vithas Hospitals
items.description: Medical directory, appointment management, and patient portal.
